## 5. <a href =  'https://agricolamz.github.io/The_Circassian_Isoglosses_Database/5.html'>all N people</a>
### Description

In Bzhedug there are special prefix aj-/əj- which can be attached to the numerals 'two', 'three', 'four' and 'five', bearing the meaning 'all N people

### Values
There are the following value for each idiom:

* Bzhedug  aj-/əj- (2, 3, 4, 5) [Ситимова 2004: 74]
